mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectItemInfo */ A.STR_NO , A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A.REL_CTR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'STR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_NO = #{strid}

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectCampList2 */ A.CAMP_NO , A.CAMP_NM , A.CAMP_DESC , A.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(A.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_CNT , A.CPN_SUM , A.CPN_MST , A.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , A.UPD_DTTM , A1.CD_NM , A2.BUY_CNT , A2.RMN_CNT , A2.TTL_CNT FROM ARA2_CAMP A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND A1.CODE = A.CAMP_PHS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.CAMP_NO , SUM(CASE WHEN A.CPN_PHS != '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BUY_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.CPN_PHS = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RMN_CNT , SUM(1) AS TTL_CNT FROM ARA2_CPN A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.CAMP_NO ) A2 ON A2.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_PHS = '2' ORDER BY A.CAMP_NO DESC

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectStrAcntInfo */ A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , NVL(A1.ACNT_BLNC, 0) AS ACNT_BLNC FROM ARA2_STR A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.ACNTHIST_NO , B.ITM_ID , B.ITM_TYP , B.ACNT_BLNC FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST B , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 AND ITM_ID = #{strid} GROUP BY ITM_ID ) C WHERE 1=1 AND B.ITM_ID = C.ITM_ID AND B.ACNTHIST_NO = C.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO ) A1 ON A1.ITM_ID = A.STR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} ORDER BY A.STR_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Ara2Str.updateBuyCpnSht */ ARA2_CPN SET CPN_PHS = '2' , ITM_NO = #{strid} , ITM_TYP = 'STR' , CPN_CNTNT = '쿠폰을 구매함' , UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_NO IN ( SELECT MIN(CPN_NO) AS MIN_CPN_NO FROM ARA2_CPN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND A.CPN_PHS = '1' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Str.updateBuyCpnSht */ ARA2_ACNTHIST SELECT SEQ_ACNTHIST.NEXTVAL , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , 0 , #{cpnSum} , A.ACNT_BLNC - #{cpnSum} , '004' , '쿠폰구매용 출금함' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 AND ITM_ID = #{strid} GROUP BY ITM_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_ID = B.ITM_ID AND A.ACNTHIST_NO = B.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectStateCpnList */ AA.CAMP_NO , AA.OCC_CNT , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_DESC , B.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , B.CPN_TYP , B.CPN_MNY , B.CPN_CNT , B.CPN_SUM , B.CPN_MST , B.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , B.UPD_DTTM , B1.CD_NM FROM ( SELECT A.CAMP_NO , COUNT(1) AS OCC_CNT FROM ARA2_CPN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_NO = #{strid} GROUP BY A.CAMP_NO ) AA , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = AA.CAMP_NO

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectGiveCpnList */ AA.CAMP_NO , AA.OCC_CNT , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_DESC , B.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , B.CPN_TYP , B.CPN_MNY , B.CPN_CNT , B.CPN_SUM , B.CPN_MST , B.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , B.UPD_DTTM , B1.CD_NM FROM ( SELECT A.CAMP_NO , COUNT(1) AS OCC_CNT FROM ARA2_CPN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_NO = #{strid} GROUP BY A.CAMP_NO ) AA , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = AA.CAMP_NO

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectUsrInfo */ A.USR_NO , A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , A.REL_STR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_NO = #{usrid}

UPDATE /* Ara2Str.updateCpnNo */ ARA2_CPN SET CPN_PHS = '3' , ITM_NO = #{usrid} , ITM_TYP = 'USR' , CPN_CNTNT = '쿠폰을 고객에게 제공함' , UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_NO IN ( SELECT MIN(CPN_NO) AS MIN_CPN_NO FROM ARA2_CPN A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND ITM_NO = #{strid} AND ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS = '2' )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectPaymentCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_NO = #{strid} AND A.ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS = '4' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC
